oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Video - Historically Speaking: The "Hallelujah!" Collection at the Memphis Room
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African Americans; Campbell, Lucy; Carter, Rubye; entertainment; film; "Hallelujah!"; Jessye, Eva; Johnson, James R.; music; Woodruff, Georgia;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A television program from the library channel in which Dr. Jim Johnson (History Department) interviews Rubye Carter. Rubye Carter was the donor of the Hallelujah! Collection and the daughter of performer Georgia Woodruff.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Memphis/Shelby County Public Library and Information Center
